entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
